posts.author: darktooth
posts.content:
A lvl 23 sorcerer, aside from having IGMS, Ice Storm, and Evard's Black Tentacles (no save spells), Wail of the Banshee and Finger of Death (death magic), Empower and Maximize metamagic, and Evocation and Conjuration Greater Spell Focus feats, has the following spells:
 
Evocation:
Incendiary Cloud, Chain Lightning, Firebrand/Cone of Cold, Scintillating Sphere, Combust
 
Conjuration:
Acid Fog, Evard’s Black Tentacles, Flame Arrow, Melf’s Acid Arrow
 
She now has to choose between Epic Spell Focus: Evocation and Epic Spell Focus: Conjuration. At first glance, and even comparing the damage potential of these spells against a single target, Evocation seems to be better:
 
Level Evocation* Conjuration* Difference (+ Evocation, - Conjuration)
9 Maximized Chain Lightning (120 x 7)a Maximized Acid Fog (300 x 7)a 0
8 Incendiary Cloud (322 x 8) Empowered Acid Fog (262.5 x 8) +476
5 Maximized Combust (220 x 8) Empowered Flame Arrow (105 x 8) +920
4 Empowered Combust (198.75 x 9) EBT (84.375 x 9) +1029.375
3 Scintillating Sphere (35 x 9) Flame Arrow (70 x 9) -315
2 Combust (129 x 9) Melf’s Acid Arrow (35 x 9) +846
*Spell School (average damage x number of spells per day)
a Wail of the Banshee (instant death) tops these spells in damage
b Finger of Death (instant death) surpasses these spells

 
However, when I looked at the representative spells, it still has me wondering, which is the better spell school?

posts.author: grizzled_dwarflord
posts.content:
Here is my breakdown for spell schools:

Arcane: Necro
Clerics: Evo
Druids: Conjo

The above are the premium schools for that class. Doesn’t mean they can’t make the others work.

As an aside, EBT doesn’t use your foci, it’s a grapple check that bypasses SR.

And if you are arcane and it comes down to either/or between evo and conjo at level 23, maybe there’s a third option you’ve overlooked.

posts.content:
@webshaman1 , I am playtesting a human in the first area of the module, Pirates of the Sword Coast, where enemy NPCs are the same level as the PC

@grizzled_dwarflord , Indeed, and Acid Fog has saves versus movement speed decrease only. I edited my first post to make it less confusing. So I think Evocation is the school more reliant on saves. Also yes, I have chosen Necromancy as the primary option.
